channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WC Fields Factory
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WC Fields Factory

item.title: CVE-2023-0277|2023-04-17T12:17:40.775Z -- unknown -- wc%20fields%20factory
item.description: The WC Fields Factory WordPress plugin through 4.1.5 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by high privilege users such as admin
